title: James Corden Addresses His Restaurant Ban
description: The “Late Late Show” host said he shouldn’t have been rude to a server at Balthazar in New York. “I hope I’m allowed in again one day,” he said.
dc:creator: Trish Bendix
category: The Late Late Show with James Corden (TV Program)
Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
